page.title: 01Landscape & Buildings:Lezant
page.content: { * * * GAZETTEER * * *} The survey area lies almost totally in the{Parish of Lezant}in East Cornwall. It is entirely rural,and the nearest town is{Launceston,}5 miles to the North.Most people live in the hamlets of{Lezant,Trebullett and Trekenner} with smaller settlements at{Landue, {Trewarlett and Trekelland.} The{Parish Church}is situated in Lezant,and there is a{Chapel}in Trebullett.The local{Primary School}is in Trekenner,and{Landue House}is a fine Georgian country house. On the next pages we hope to tell you about the area in more detail,and how the people live in 1985. { {* * * * * * * * *
